hidden_dimensions.name: Warmth Level
hidden_dimensions.description: Users want to know how warm the coat is and for what temperatures it is suitable. This is beyond just 'warm' or 'not warm,' but more specific.

hidden_dimensions.name: Sizing Accuracy
hidden_dimensions.description: Users frequently mention whether the coat runs small, large, or true to size. They often compare it to their usual size and body measurements (height, weight, hips/butt size) and other clothing items.

hidden_dimensions.name: Material Quality & Feel
hidden_dimensions.description: Users care about the softness, thickness, and overall quality of the material. They also describe how the material feels against the skin (e.g., itchy or comfortable).

hidden_dimensions.name: Pocket Functionality
hidden_dimensions.description: Users comment on the placement and usability of the pockets.  Issues include awkward placement, buttons obstructing use.

hidden_dimensions.name: Shedding/Lint
hidden_dimensions.description: Users mention if the coat sheds material or generates a lot of lint.  Also if it attracts hair, lint or other particles.

hidden_dimensions.name: Sleeve Length/Fit
hidden_dimensions.description: How well the sleeves fit (length and snugness).
